body:
## What happened

Trying to fold a selection of text, no folding occurs.

## Version information

Android Studio `Arctic Fox | 2020.3.1 Patch 2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 60.1.2` • Dart plugin `203.8292`

Flutter 2.5.1 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision ffb2ecea52 (12 days ago) • 2021-09-17 15:26:33 -0400
Engine • revision b3af521a05
Tools • Dart 2.14.2

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Wrong end: 13712; document length=6911; start=13702
```

title: Trying to fold a method || Widget || anything
